bill.title: Interagency Coordinating Council for Children and Youth; extend repealer on.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 43-14-1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Establishes The Interagency Coordinating Council For Children And Youth, To Extend The Date Of Repeal On This Section From July 1, 2010, To July 1, 2013; To Clarify The Membership Of Multidisciplinary Assessment And Planning Resource (map) Teams; To Amend Section 43-14-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provides The Duties Of Such Council, To Extend The Date Of Repeal On This Section From July 1, 2010, To July 1, 2013; To Amend Section 43-14-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provides A Special Fund For A Statewide System Of Care By Map Teams Utilizing Such Funds, To Extend The Date Of Repeal On This Section From July 1, 2010, To July 1, 2013; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Human Services
